ComicInfo.Summary:
Who will Ral, Kaya, and Vraska encounter on Dominaria?
The answer will scatter the Planeswalkers across the multiverse as the race to find out who is behind the attacks on Ravnica continues!
The answer may lie with one of the oldest living Planeswalkers...
